document.full_text: global miner rio tinto   said on tuesday its first-quarter iron ore production would be hit by a string of cyclones that swept through its mining operations in australia last month.
document.title: rio tinto says cyclones will hit q1 iron ore output
lines_and_colors: global miner rio tinto   said on tuesday its first-quarter iron ore production would be hit by a string of cyclones that swept through its mining operations in australia last month.
